Locke (2013)

Dutch

te hebben. Vanavond zal dat leven echter totaal uiteenvallen. Aan de
vooravond van de grootste uitdaging uit zijn carriÃƒÂ¨re, krijgt hij een

English
Leaving the construction site on the eve of a major project, construction
manager Ivan Locke receives news that sends him driving the two hours from
Birmingham to London, but even further from the life he once knew. Making
the decision that he has to make, he then calls his wife, his sons, his
co-workers and boss telling them the secret that he is bearing and trying
to keep his job and family intact. But even more importantly, he will have
to face himself and the choices he has made.
